document.full_text: montreal goaltender carey price was in spectacular form in earning his third career nhl playoff shutout as the canadiens beat the boston bruins 2-0 on thursday.
document.title: habs put a price on bruins to take series opener
lines_and_colors: montreal goaltender carey price was in spectacular form in earning his third career nhl playoff shutout as the canadiens beat the boston bruins 2-0 on thursday.
